.. _`Resources`:

Resources
=========
This section describes class and functions private to <application-name>. It is intended to document how the application works

labs.lab-1
----------
In our first lab, we completed a pull request.

labs.lab-2
----------
In our second lab, we setup PIP and installed a virtual environment.

labs.lab-3
----------
In our third lab, we created and connected to a postgres db.

labs.lab-4
----------
In our fourth lab, we worked on SQL queries.

labs.lab-5
----------
In our fifth lab, we built intentionally bad GUIs

labs.lab-6
----------
In our sixth lab, we made an HTML form.
labs.lab-7
----------
In our seventh lab, we worked on input validation and other logging.

labs.lab-8
----------
In our eighth lab, we worked on functions

labs.lab-9
----------
In our ninth lab, we ran testing

labs.lab-10
-----------
In this lab, we are working on documentation
